objective: As a dedicated and professional Web & Front-End Developer, I have a sharp eye for detail and a strong passion for delivering high-quality, user-centric solutions. With a solid foundation in modern web technologies, I excel at creating dynamic, responsive, and visually stunning user interfaces.

projects.name: Online Learning Portal

projects.description: Developed a scalable and secure identity verification platform integrating biometric authentication, liveness detection, and silent device verification.
